mapper.select: SELECT * FROM menus WHERE restaurant_id = #{restaurantId} ORDER BY is_popular DESC, name ASC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO menus (restaurant_id, name, price, description, image, is_popular) VALUES (#{restaurantId}, #{name}, #{price}, #{description}, #{image}, #{isPopular})
mapper.update: UPDATE menus SET name = #{name}, price = #{price}, description = #{description}, image = #{image}, is_popular = #{isPopular} WHERE id = #{id}
